title: looking for this san serif font
content:
does anyone know what font they are using on this site? The san serif font, not the script.

thanks for any help.

[http://www.kimfiscus.com/home.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500/http:/www.kimfiscus.com/home.html "http://www.kimfiscus.com/home.html")  
Jan

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/kim_5301.png)

 [‹ the C and the M](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39572 "Go to previous forum topic") [Processing.org ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39561 "Go to next forum topic")
author: graphicmuse

comments.content:
Neutraface, by House Industries.

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=18")

They have a new version of Neutraface as well, Neutraface No. 2

[http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612](http://web.archive.org/web/20071129212500/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612 "http://www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=612")
Thank! I forgot to look at House! Now I’ll see if my client will pay for it...
